gw.bc.account.entity

Interface PaymentAllocationPlan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, EventAware, com.guidewire.pl.domain.messaging.gen.EventAwareStubI, HistoryEventContainer, com.guidewire.bc.domain.history.gen.HistoryEventContainerStubI, IGosuObject, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, NotInCurrencySilo, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.NotInCurrencySiloStubI, com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.PaymentAllocationPlanStubI, Plan, com.guidewire.bc.domain.plan.gen.PlanStubI, Retireable, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, com.guidewire.pl.system.entity.Subtype, com.guidewire.pl.system.entity.SubtypeBean, Validatable, com.guidewire.pl.domain.validation.gen.ValidatableStubI, Versionable

    public interface PaymentAllocationPlan
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.PaymentAllocationPlanStubI
    PaymentAllocationPlan Defines a plan that specifies distribution and allocation of moneys from payments, excess unapplied funds, etc., to InvoiceItems for an Account.

      Applies the distribution criteria filters set for this plan to the specified RestrictionBuilder, excluding the filters related to distribution limit types, i.e. the NextInvoice, BilledOrDue and PastDue filters.

    • Method Detail

      • addDistributionCriteriaFilter

        void addDistributionCriteriaFilter(DistributionFilterType filterType)
        Add a distribution criterion for the specified DistributionFilterType. This is a no-op if it has already been added.
        Parameters:
        filterType - the unique DistributionFilterType that identifies the filter criterion to be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the filterType is null.

      • removeDistributionCriteriaFilter

        void removeDistributionCriteriaFilter(DistributionFilterType filterType)
        Remove the distribution criterion for the specified DistributionFilterType.
        Parameters:
        filterType - the unique DistributionFilterType that identifies the filter criterion to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the filterType is null.

      • getDistributionFilters

        java.util.Set<DistributionFilterType> getDistributionFilters()
        Returns:
        The Set of distribution criteria filters specified for this plan.

      • getInvoiceItemOrderings

        java.util.Set<InvoiceItemOrderingType> getInvoiceItemOrderings()
        Returns:
        the Set of invoice item orderings specified for this plan.

      • applyDistributionCriteriaFilters

        void applyDistributionCriteriaFilters(RestrictionBuilder<InvoiceItem> restrictions,
                                    DirectBillMoneyRcvd moneyRcvd)
        Applies the distribution criteria filters set for this plan to the specified RestrictionBuilder.
        Parameters:
        restrictions - The RestrictionBuilder used to identify the InvoiceItems to which to distribute.
        moneyRcvd - The money money received from which the payment originated.

      • applyDistributionCriteriaFiltersWithoutDistributionLimits

        void applyDistributionCriteriaFiltersWithoutDistributionLimits(RestrictionBuilder<InvoiceItem> restrictions,
                                                             DirectBillMoneyRcvd moneyRcvd)
        Applies the distribution criteria filters set for this plan to the specified RestrictionBuilder, excluding the filters related to distribution limit types, i.e. the NextInvoice, BilledOrDue and PastDue filters.
        Parameters:
        restrictions - The RestrictionBuilder used to identify the InvoiceItems to which to distribute.
        moneyRcvd - The money money received from which the payment originated.

      • getCompoundedInvoiceItemAllocationOrdering

        com.google.common.collect.Ordering<InvoiceItem> getCompoundedInvoiceItemAllocationOrdering(DirectBillMoneyRcvd moneyRcvd)
        Compounds together all the InvoiceItemOrderings for the InvoiceItemOrderingTypes on this allocation plan to get an ordering comprised of all of them.
        Parameters:
        moneyRcvd - The DirectBillMoneyRcvd being applied to the invoice items in a payment.
        Returns:
        An ordering comprised of all of the InvoiceItemOrderingTypes on this plan.

      • addInvoiceItemOrderingFor

        void addInvoiceItemOrderingFor(InvoiceItemOrderingType invoiceItemOrderingType)
        Adds an invoice item ordering to this plan for the specified ordering type. It will be added at the end, meaning it will have the lowest (latest) priority.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItemOrderingType - The ordering type to add to this plan.

      • decreaseInvoiceItemOrderingPriority

        void decreaseInvoiceItemOrderingPriority(@Nonnull
                                       InvoiceItemOrderingType invoiceItemOrderingType)
        Decreases the priority order of an invoice item ordering if it is used by this plan. Otherwise this is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItemOrderingType - The invoice item ordering type to look for and decrease if possible.

      • increaseInvoiceItemOrderingPriority

        void increaseInvoiceItemOrderingPriority(@Nonnull
                                       InvoiceItemOrderingType invoiceItemOrderingType)
        Increases the priority order of an invoice item ordering if it is used by this plan. Otherwise this is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItemOrderingType - The invoice item ordering type to look for and increase if possible.

      • getInvoiceItemOrderingFor

        InvoiceItemOrdering getInvoiceItemOrderingFor(InvoiceItemOrderingType invoiceItemOrderingType)
        Gets the InvoiceItemOrdering related to the provided InvoiceItemOrderingType.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItemOrderingType - The typekey associated with the InvoiceOrderingType we're looking for.
        Returns:
        The InvoiceItemOrdering related to the provided TypeKey.

      • getDistributionCriterionByFilter

        DistributionCriterionFilter getDistributionCriterionByFilter(DistributionFilterType filterType)
        Gets the DistributionCriterionFilter related to the provided DistributionFilterType.
        Parameters:
        filterType - The typekey associated with the DistributionCriterionFilter we're looking for.
        Returns:
        The DistributionCriterionFilter related to the provided TypeKey.

      • removeInvoiceItemOrderingFor

        void removeInvoiceItemOrderingFor(InvoiceItemOrderingType orderingType)
        Remove the invoice item ordering for the specified InvoiceItemOrderingType.
        Parameters:
        orderingType - the unique InvoiceItemOrderingType that identifies the invoice item allocation ordering to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the orderingType is null.
